message: When I open my eyes, there's a gas mask staring back at me.
Clear lets out a sigh of relief for some reason, then bows and leaves the room.
Was he watching me sleep or something?
Obviously, this isn't the first time I've thought this... but damn, that guy is weird.
I get out of bed and get dressed.
I pick up Ren and leave the room.
A delicious smell wafts down the hall. Clear must be making breakfast again.
